title: Audit roles and permissions
content:
This page details the roles and permissions required for users to create or view audits.

When you are installing the Audit service using the Helm installer, you should enter the super user details (super user and super user org) in the values.yaml file. A super user is a user who has admin privileges in the system (for example, super user: suite admin, super user org: SYSBO). This seeds the Audit service roles, groups, and permissions in the IdM portal during Audit installation.

Audit service permissions

This table shows all the Audit service permissions:

Permission Description
AUDIT_ADMIN The user has administrative permission for the Audit service.
CREATE_AUDIT Users with this permission can create audits.
DELETE_AUDIT Users with this permission can delete audits.
VIEW_SYSTEM_LEVEL_AUDIT

Users with this permission can only view system level audits. For example, creation of a tenant in SYSBO org is a system level event.

Note: A SYSBO tenant user who has VIEW_SYSTEM_LEVEL_AUDIT permissions is able to view the system level audit data of all the tenants.

A non-SYSBO tenant user with VIEW_SYSTEM_LEVEL_AUDIT permissions is able to view the system level audit data only for the tenant that it belongs to.
VIEW_TENANT_LEVEL_AUDIT Users with this permission can only view tenant level audits. For example, logging into a tenant is a tenant level event.

Audit service roles

This table shows the Audit roles and the permissions associated with them:

Role Permission
audit-management CREATE_AUDIT, DELETE_AUDIT
view-system-level-audit VIEW_SYSTEM_LEVEL_AUDIT
view-tenant-level-audit VIEW_TENANT_LEVEL_AUDIT

Audit user groups

This table shows the Audit service groups:

User group Description
administrators This group includes the administrator group of the SYSBO tenant only. This group includes the view_system_level_audit, view_tenant_level_audit, and audit-management roles.
view-system-level-audit This group includes the view_system_level_audit role.
view-tenant-level-audit This group includes the view_tenant_level_audit role.
